Description: Body sherd of South Ionian Middle Wild Goat style pottery dinos (?); outside, white slip, legs of feline(?) animal, to right; filling ornaments; inside glazed
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (pp.34-5, no. A. 2c, pl. 1, no. 4)
van de Wiel 1968 / Verzameling ceramiek en Terracotta's Archaeologisch Instituut der Rijksuniversiteit Leiden (p. 2-3, N 6, pl. 1, N 6)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.027)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: T.2497 (Musée Scheurleer (The Hague) Registration number)
